mapper.sql: id, user_id userId, doc_id docId, cost_score costScore, evaluate, comment, create_time createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT dd.id, dd.user_id userId, dd.doc_id docId, dd.cost_score costScore, dd.evaluate, dd.comment, dd.create_time createTime,u.name uName,u.nickname uNickname,d.title dTitle FROM doc_download dd LEFT JOIN `user` u ON u.id=dd.user_id LEFT JOIN `doc` d ON d.id=dd.doc_id
ORDER BY #{sortBy} DESC, dd.create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM doc_download dd LEFT JOIN doc d ON dd.doc_id=d.id
SELECT COUNT(id) > 0 FROM doc_download WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND doc_id=#{docId}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM doc_download WHERE doc_id = #{docId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_download ( user_id, doc_id, cost_score, evaluate, comment, create_time ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{docId}, #{costScore}, #{evaluate}, #{comment}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM doc_category c1 LEFT JOIN doc_category c2 ON c1.`id` = c2.`fid` LEFT JOIN doc d ON d.`category_id` = c2.`id` LEFT JOIN doc_download dd ON dd.`doc_id` = d.`id` WHERE c1.`fid` IS NULL AND c1.`id` = #{categoryId} AND DATE(dd.`create_time`) = DATE(#{searchTime})
